description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named HelloController. It provides basic endpoints including a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints like welcome message, API docs redirect, health check, and application info for the wikitoneo4jbackend

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a greeting message when accessing the root endpoint '/'

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI documentation page, preserving the request scheme, host, and port

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns the health status of the application

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides application information such as name and version
